filmography.title: The Small Voice
filmography.role_description: A ruthless escaped convict who holds a playwright and his wife hostage in their cottage; Keel's film debut.
filmography.plot: A playwright and his wife rescue the survivors of a car crash, only to discover they are escaped convicts who take them hostage.

filmography.title: Annie Get Your Gun
filmography.role_description: The cocky star marksman of Buffalo Bill's Wild West Show who falls for the sharp-shooting Annie Oakley.
filmography.plot: The story of the romance between sharpshooters Annie Oakley and Frank Butler.

filmography.title: Pagan Love Song
filmography.role_description: An American schoolteacher who inherits a plantation in Tahiti and falls for a half-American, half-Polynesian woman.
filmography.plot: A schoolteacher travels to Tahiti to take over a plantation, only to find it is not the paradise he expected.

filmography.title: Three Guys Named Mike
filmography.role_description: A pilot who is one of three men named Mike vying for the affections of a flight attendant.
filmography.plot: An airline stewardess is pursued by three men with the same first name: a pilot, a professor, and an ad man.

filmography.title: Show Boat
filmography.role_description: A charismatic riverboat gambler who marries the captain's daughter, only to leave her when his luck runs out.
filmography.plot: The lives and loves of performers and workers on a Mississippi River show boat over 40 years.

filmography.title: Texas Carnival
filmography.role_description: A carnival barker who, along with his partner, is mistaken for a wealthy cattle baron.
filmography.plot: A dunk-tank worker and his partner are mistaken for millionaires at a Texas resort hotel.

filmography.title: Callaway Went Thataway
filmography.role_description: A real cowboy hired to impersonate a missing, drunken western movie star for a publicity campaign.
filmography.plot: Advertising execs hire a real cowboy to pose as a famous western star who has disappeared on a drinking binge.

filmography.title: Lovely to Look At
filmography.role_description: A Broadway producer who inherits half of a dress shop in Paris and tries to turn it into a success.
filmography.plot: Three producers inherit a dress shop in Paris and try to save it from bankruptcy.

filmography.title: Desperate Search
filmography.role_description: A bush pilot who frantically searches the Canadian wilderness for his two children after a plane crash.
filmography.plot: A pilot searches for his children who are lost in the Canadian wilderness after a plane crash.

filmography.title: Fast Company
filmography.role_description: A horse owner who tricks a woman into buying a failing horse, leading to romance and rivalry.
filmography.plot: A racehorse owner schemes to outwit a female rival but ends up falling in love with her.

filmography.title: Ride, Vaquero!
filmography.role_description: A rancher trying to build an empire in Texas who faces violent opposition from a local bandit leader.
filmography.plot: Ranchers in post-Civil War Texas try to fend off a bandit leader who is the estranged brother of the ranch owner.

filmography.title: Calamity Jane
filmography.role_description: The legendary lawman and gunfighter who shares a tempestuous, bantering romance with Calamity Jane.
filmography.plot: Calamity Jane is a rough-riding cowgirl who tries to bring a famous actress to Deadwood but brings her maid instead.

filmography.title: Kiss Me Kate
filmography.role_description: An ego-driven actor/director producing a musical version of 'The Taming of the Shrew' with his ex-wife.
filmography.plot: Divorced actors Fred and Lilli are reunited for a musical adaptation of 'The Taming of the Shrew,' where their onstage battles mirror their offstage relationship.

filmography.title: Rose Marie
filmography.role_description: A Canadian Mountie who falls for a wild French-Canadian girl, though she loves a trapper.
filmography.plot: A Mountie takes custody of a wild girl, leading to a romantic triangle involving a fur trapper.

filmography.title: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers
filmography.role_description: The eldest of seven rough backwoods brothers who marries a town girl and inspires his brothers to find wives.
filmography.plot: When the eldest of seven brothers living on the frontier brings home a bride, she attempts to civilize his six rowdy siblings.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Musical Score; National Film Registry (Inducted 2004)

filmography.title: Jupiter's Darling
filmography.role_description: The Carthaginian general who marches on Rome but is distracted by the charms of a beautiful Roman woman.
filmography.plot: Hannibal marches on Rome, but is distracted by a beautiful woman who tries to save the city by seducing him.

filmography.title: Kismet
filmography.role_description: A clever street poet in old Baghdad who talks his way into wealth and power while trying to marry off his daughter.
filmography.plot: A beggar-magician becomes king for a day and tries to marry his daughter to a prince while wooing the queen of dancers.

filmography.title: Floods of Fear
filmography.role_description: A convict who escapes during a flood and saves a woman, trying to prove his innocence before the law catches up.
filmography.plot: Two convicts and a guard are swept away by a flood and take refuge in a house with a young woman.

filmography.title: The Big Fisherman
filmography.role_description: The apostle Peter, portrayed from his days as a fisherman to his conversion to Christianity.
filmography.plot: The life of Simon Peter, the fisherman who became one of Jesus' apostles, and an Arab princess seeking revenge.

filmography.title: Armored Command
filmography.role_description: A tough American colonel in WWII who suspects a German female spy has infiltrated his lines.
filmography.plot: During the Battle of the Bulge, an American colonel tries to uncover a Nazi spy in his sector.

filmography.title: The Day of the Triffids
filmography.role_description: A merchant seaman who retains his sight after a meteor shower and fights man-eating plants to save humanity.
filmography.plot: After a meteor shower blinds most of the world's population, man-eating plants called Triffids begin to take over.

filmography.title: Waco
filmography.role_description: A gunfighter pardoned from prison to clean up a lawless town in Wyoming.
filmography.plot: A gunfighter is pardoned from prison to clean up a lawless town, where he finds his former lover is now married.

filmography.title: Red Tomahawk
filmography.role_description: An army captain trying to warn a town of an impending Sioux attack after the massacre at Little Bighorn.
filmography.plot: After the Little Bighorn massacre, an army captain tries to get Gatling guns to a besieged town.

filmography.title: The War Wagon
filmography.role_description: A sardonic, sophisticated Native American who aids John Wayne and Kirk Douglas in a gold heist.
filmography.plot: A rancher shoots a man who tried to kill him and then hires him to help steal a shipment of gold from a corrupt businessman.

filmography.title: Arizona Bushwhackers
filmography.role_description: A Confederate prisoner who becomes a sheriff in an Arizona town to stop arms smugglers.
filmography.plot: A Confederate spy is sent to a Western town to stop weapons from being sold to the Apaches.
